org.apache.giraph.comm.netty

类 NettyWorkerClientRequestProcessor<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.giraph.comm.netty.NettyWorkerClientRequestProcessor<I,V,E,M>
  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data
    所有已实现的接口:
    WorkerClientRequestProcessor<I,V,E,M>

    public class NettyWorkerClientRequestProcessor<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends Object
implements WorkerClientRequestProcessor<I,V,E,M>
    Aggregate requests and sends them to the thread-safe NettyClient. This class is not thread-safe and expected to be used and then thrown away after a phase of communication has completed.

    • 构造器概要

      Constructor.

      • sendEdgeRequest

        public boolean sendEdgeRequest(I sourceVertexId,
                      Edge<I,E> edge)
                        throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerClientRequestProcessor
        Sends a request to the source vertex owner to add an edge. Note: this request follows an optimized code path used by edge-based input, and doesn't coordinate with mutations.
        指定者:
        sendEdgeRequest 在接口中 WorkerClientRequestProcessor<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
        参数:
        sourceVertexId - Source vertex id.
        edge - Edge to be added.
        返回:
        Returns true iff any network I/O occurred.
        抛出:
        IOException

      • flush

        public void flush()
           throws IOException
        从接口复制的说明: WorkerClientRequestProcessor
        Flush all outgoing messages. This ensures that all the messages have been sent, but not guaranteed to have been delivered yet.
        指定者:
        flush 在接口中 WorkerClientRequestProcessor<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
